IMMOVABLE_MASS - Static variable in class danogl.components.GameObjectPhysics
When a GameObject with this mass collides with another GameObject, and they are both set to not only collide but also to resolve the collision themselves (using GameObjectPhysics.preventIntersectionsFromDirection(Vector2), this object's velocity will not be affected by the collision.

Create a new Transition.
TRANSITION_BACK_AND_FORTH - danogl.components.Transition.TransitionType
After transitioning to final value, go back in reverse to the initial value, from there back to final value and so on
TRANSITION_LOOP - danogl.components.Transition.TransitionType
Repetitively transition from initial value to final, and back to initial
TRANSITION_ONCE - danogl.components.Transition.TransitionType
Transition only once, from initial value to final.
Transition.Interpolator<T> - Interface in danogl.components
Represents an interpolator, which receives an initial value, a final value, and a t parameter between 0 and 1, and returns the in-between value at t

Type of transition
